sect2.title: To Path
sect2.para: The To Path command converts a selection into a path. The image does not seem to change, but you can see the new path in the Paths Dialog. By using the Path tool in the Toolbox, you can precisely adapt the outline of the selection. You can find further information regarding paths in the Paths Dialog section.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
Select To Path .
You can also access this command from the bottom bar of the Selection Editor.
You can also access this command from the Paths Dialog which offers a lot of Advanced Options.
